Row.Text: Cities with a National Park receive +10% [ICON_Faith] Faith. When adjacent to Mountains, Woods, or Natural Wonders, City Centers receive +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith, and Holy Sites receive +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith and +1 [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet point. Gain the Miko of Ameth unique unit with Mercantilism.

Kokkoro's unique civilian unit that replaces the Naturalist. Cheaper to purchase than the Naturalist it replaces. Can create a single National Park to attract [ICON_Tourism] tourists. May convert [ICON_Citizen] Citizens to their Religion and initiate theological combat with units of other Religions. Must be purchased with [ICON_Faith] Faith.

Ameth has sent you a new oracle, little guide Kokkoro. Magnificent nature is your source of power, and you will protect your people and allies steadily with its help. If you can have strong conviction, your calls will be answered by your patron deity. Go forth with blessings of wind spirits, and surely you will be successful in every endeavour.
